name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Contextual Tab Groups - Auto create groups when opening a new tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group tabs by context for you automatically. Inspired by Opera One.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Full Support: Chrome, MSEdge, Brave, NaverWhale
Will not work on: Opera, Opera GX, Vivaldi, Kiwi, Quetta (or similar mobile browsers)

This extension helps you manage your tabs automatically and conveniently!

✅ Automatic Tab Groups Creation (Custom Tab Group Names)
   - Default & Search Engine tabs can be set differently!
   - Supports setting Tab Group names to your search query!
   - Supports Placeholders!
✅ Auto Disband Groups with only 1 tabs (togglable)
✅ Alt+T Shortcut to open newtab in current/new tab group (shortcut changable/deletable)

Extension Options: https://github.com/SpookyKipper/ContextualTabGroups?tab=readme-ov-file#extension-options

Permissions Justifications:
tabs: Detect Newly open tabs. Group Tabs, Ungroup Tabs, Detect Tab Removal Event, Detect Tab Groups with only 1 tab in it
tabGroups: List All Tab Groups for Detecting Tab Groups with only 1 tab in it
storage: To store the data of extension options
